additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value:
INGREDIENTS: Pudding (71%) [Sultanas (18%), Raisins (11%), Inverted Sugar Syrup, Brown Sugar, French Brandy (9%), Glace Cherries (8%) (Cherry (52%), Inverted Sugar Syrup, Natural Colour (163), Acidity Regulator (330), Preservatives (Sulphur Dioxide (Sulphites), 224 (Sulphites))), Wheat Flour, Rice Bran Oil, Sliced Almonds (3%), Cider (Preservative (224 (Sulphites))), Breadcrumb (Wheat Flour, Salt, Yeast), Water, Lemon Peel, Golden Syrup, Cream (Milk), Dried Apricot (Apricot, Preservative (Sulphur Dioxide (Sulphites)), Molasses, Humectant (422 from Palm**), Port, Free Range Egg Powder, Spices, Salt, Orange Oil], Syrup (17%) [Glucose, Golden Syrup, Glace Orange Peels (18%) (Orange Peel, Sugar, Salt, Preservatives (Potassium Sorbate, 223 (Sulphites)), Acidity Regulators (330, Sodium Carbonates), Mineral Salt (339, 509)), Water, Thickener (1442), Brandy (Natural Flavouring)], Glace Cherries (9%) [Cherry (50%), Inverted Sugar Syrup, Natural Colour (163), Acidity Regulator (330), Preservatives (Sulphur Dioxide (Sulphites), 224 (Sulphites))], Almonds (3.5%).

Contains 1.4mL of alcohol per 100g of pudding

additionalProperty.name: Allergen
additionalProperty.value: Contains SULPHITES, Contains MILK, Contains Almonds, Contains EGG, Contains Gluten, Contains Wheat

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: Food Warnings: Cherries are mechanically pitted and may contain an occasional pit or pit fragment. Take care to avoid dental injury.

description: Our Finest Pudding is infused with French Brandy, topped with cherries, almonds and infused with a glistening syrup.
name: Luxury Christmas Pudding Small
